name: Elemental Shadows
description:
Choose your Element carefully to fight a horde of enemies including your own Shadow!

Go further in the Randomized Rooms or fight the Bosses.

Made for Mini Jam 111 -> Theme and Limitation: Colors and You are your own enemy.

DEFAULT CONTROLS :

Move -> WASD or Arrow Keys

Atk -> hold Space, Z or Left Mouse Button

P -> Pause
